quote:
Life ... is a tale
Told by an idiot, full of sound and fury,
Signifying nothing.
speaker: William Shakespeare

quote: Always find time for the things that make you feel happy to be alive.
speaker: NULL

quote: Patience is not simply the ability to wait - it's how we behave while we're waiting.
speaker: Joyce Meyer

quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
speaker: Nelson Mandela

quote: A person who won’t read is no better than a person who can’t read.
speaker: Mark Twain

quote: What need is there to weep over parts of life? The whole of it calls for tears.
speaker: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: It takes passion to create art, not hard work.
speaker: NULL

quote: The way you tell your story to yourself matters.
speaker: Amy Cuddy

quote: Although the world is full of suffering, it is also full of the overcoming of it.
speaker: Helen Keller

quote: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
speaker: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: A person who feels appreciated will always do more than what is expected of him.
speaker: NULL

quote: Finding good players is easy. Getting them to play as a team is another story.
speaker: Casey Stengel

quote: Pain is inevitable, Suffering is optional.
speaker: NULL

quote: Life is what happens while you are busy making excuses.
speaker: NULL

quote: Maintain a journal of your life, or you'll lose the great moments.
speaker: NULL

quote: Contentment is the only real wealth.
speaker: Alfred Nobel

quote: Life would be tragic if it weren't funny.
speaker: Stephen Hawking

quote: Good stuff happens if you make it happen.
speaker: NULL

quote: The only normal people are the one's you don't know very well.
speaker: Alfred Adler

quote: Management is the art of getting work done through and with the people.
speaker: NULL

quote: A life without festivity is a long road without an inn.
speaker: Democritus

quote: It's a wide-wide world out there, and life can be a love affair; Or a cage of sheer despair. You’re a Choice Millionaire.
speaker: Poets of the fall

quote: Kindness is more important than wisdom, and the recognition of this is the beginning of wisdom.
speaker: Theodore Isaac Rubin

quote: Get Busy living or get busy dying.
speaker: Andy Dufresne, The Shawshank Redemption

quote: Once you realize how beautiful you are, you will find it hard to keep the company of those who do not.
speaker: Bruce Jett

quote: You are the average of the group with which you spend your days.
speaker: Anuvrat Parashar

quote: Can you no longer see a road to freedom? It’s right in front of you. You need only turn over your wrists.
speaker: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Cause we are the masters of our own fate.
speaker: Lana Del Ray, Lust for life

quote: We suffer not from the events of our life but our judgement of them.
speaker: Epictetus

quote: Life is not a task to be completed but a symphony to be enjoyed.
speaker: NULL

quote: Life is 10% what you make it and 90% what you take it.
speaker: NULL

quote: If you want to tell people the truth, make them laugh, otherwise they'll kill you.
speaker: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Peace begins when expectations end.
speaker: Gautam Buddha

quote: When my information changes, i alter my conclusions. What do you do, sir?
speaker: Paul Samuelson

quote: You can't stop the waves but you can learn to surf.
speaker: Jon Kabat Zinn

quote: Nature gave us one tongue and two ears so we could hear twice as much as we speak.
speaker: Epictectus

quote: Ego is a wonderful servant but a terrible master.
speaker: Elizabeth Gilbert

quote: Your education is over when you decide its over; otherwise it goes on till you die.
speaker: NULL

quote: If i die; i die, but i first live a fulfilled life.
speaker: NULL

quote: Be a philosopher, but amidst all your philosophy, be a man.
speaker: David Hume

quote: We are fools whether we dance or not, so we might as well dance.
speaker: Japanese Proverb

quote: You will never be free until you free yourself from the prison of your false thoughts
speaker: Philip Arnold

quote: Do small things with great love
speaker: Mother Teresa

quote: If you argue for your limitations you get to keep them. But if you argue for your possibilities you get to create them!
speaker: Kelly Lee Phipps

quote: Learning does not make one learned: there are those who have knowledge and those who have understanding.  The first requires memory and the second philosophy.
speaker: Alexandre Dumas, The Count of Monte Cristo

quote: Nothing in life is to be feared, it is only to be understood. Now is the time to understand more, so that we may fear less.
speaker: Marie Curie

quote: If you are not interested in politics, doesn't mean politics isn't interested in you.
speaker: Pericles

quote: Worry less about how many people you are connected to and a whole lot more about with whom you are connected.
speaker: NULL

quote: I disapprove of what you say, but I will defend to the death your right to say it.
speaker: Voltaire

quote: Those who have a 'why' to live, can bear with almost any 'how'.
speaker: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Everything can be taken from a man but one thing: the last of the human freedoms — to choose one’s attitude in any given set of circumstances, to choose one’s own way.
speaker: Viktor E. Frankl

quote: Happiness cannot be pursued; it must ensue.
speaker: Viktor E. Frankl, Man's Search for Meaning

quote: Between stimulus and response there is a space. In that space is our power to choose our response. In our response lies our growth and our freedom.
speaker: Viktor E. Frankl

quote: To live is to suffer, to survive is to find some meaning in the suffering.
speaker: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Life is never made unbearable by circumstances, but only by lack of meaning and purpose.
speaker: Victor Frankl

quote: If it seems too good to be true, it probably is
speaker: Proverb
